review.reviewBody: Good Veggie Samosa (1pc) and decent Channa Bhatura
The Kachori  is really good. Channa Bhatura is good too except not enough channa.
Samosa were tasteless and raw from inside. Not happy. Pakora was over fried.
Food doe tast good!!! Dal were so thi feels like soup! And sabji was on rice platter and everyt was messy !!!! They mentioned raita and desert but i didnot received it!!!!
Aloo Parathas were nice. Chai Tea needs to be worked on
